answers: Ecosystem is the functional unit of the environment comprising of the living and nonliving components.  1

questions: What is meant by biological magnification ?
answers: Biological magnification is the process of increasing the concentration of harmful chemicals like pesticides from first trophic level to the last trophic level in a food chain.

questions: DDT has entered food chain. Which food habit is safer-vegetarian or non-vegetarian ?
answers: Vegetarian habit is safer. Being closer to producers, less DDT will accumulate in our body. Bio magnification leads to higher level of DDT in higher trophic levels.

questions: Mention the role of micro-organisms like bacteria and fungi.
answers: They break down the dead remains and waste product of organisms.

questions: Mention the role of decomposers in our ecosystem.
answers: These micro-organisms break down the complex organic substances into simple inorganic substances that go into the soil and are used once more by plants.  1

questions: What will happen if we kill all the organisms in one trophic level ?
answers: If we kill all the organisms in one trophic level, the population of organisms in previous trophic level will increase.
